channel.title: Attack delay\Weapons timer\Weapons speed :) Help NEEDED!
channel.description: Hello, I'm using RichScapePK (v3) and I was wondering, how could I change wep timers? GSes are very fast in the serv, but how can I make them slower? What file?

item.title: Attack delay\Weapons timer\Weapons speed :) Help NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

I tried changing PKdelay and Wepdelay, but nothing, still same speed …
I hope thats correct…

[CODE] public void AGSSpecial() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2746) {
setAnimation(2890);
actionTimer = 11;
SpecDamgNPC(65);
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(75);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2746) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(75);
        startAnimation(2890);
        actionTimer = 11;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}[/CODE]

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (2746)) // dragon 2h { PkingDelay = 11; wepdelay = 11; }
Idk why the Dragon 2H is written there…
2746 is AGS.

Read full topic
